query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `performance_uploads` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `uploadedBy` int NOT NULL,
  `fileName` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `fileKey` varchar(512),
  `fileUrl` text,
  `totalRecords` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `processedRecords` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `skippedRecords` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `newAlunos` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `updatedRecords` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `status` enum('processing','completed','error') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'processing',
  `errorMessage` text,
  `summary` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `performance_uploads_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kPX7CjhqdMFT8y.9c22f9f54902 --database 5n7arrGNHjNdoFCMzyGXcY --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `performance_uploads` (

  `uploadedBy` int NOT NULL,
  `fileName` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `fileKey` varchar(512),
  `fileUrl` text,

  `updatedRecords` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `status` enum('processing','completed','error') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'processing',
  `errorMessage` text,
  `summary` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `performance_uploads_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
